attributes.action: Declare your support for the Prime Ministers decision to prorogue   Parliament
attributes.additional_details: There is already a petition in place against prorogation and there are numerous media interviews from MP's and members of the public that remonstrate their objection. There is little media attention given to those members of the public that support the PM
attributes.background: The public and many MP's not supporting the PM's constitutionally correct  decision to prorogue have received considerable publicity and have loudly aired their views. I believe there is a majority in the country that support the PM's decision and a petition to confirm that gives them a voice
